full_summary:
## Aircraft Towbars Tender

### Tender Details

*   [Reference Number](reference-number): cb-149-66021970
*   [Amendment Number](amendment-number): 6
*   [Solicitation Number](solicitation-number): W8485-247812/A
*   [Publication Date](publication-date): October 11, 2023
*   [Tender Closing Date](tender-closing-date): November 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
*   [Amendment Date](amendment-date): November 15, 2023
*   [Expected Contract Start Date](expected-contract-start-date): December 15, 2023
*   [Expected Contract End Date](expected-contract-end-date): January 17, 2024

### Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of aircraft towbars in compliance with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and other trade agreements.

### Delivery Details

*   Items: 4 * TOWBAR, AIRCRAFT ( GSIN: 1730, NSN: 1730-01-576-2655, Part No.: FLY-AWAY P3, NCAGE: 1DD63 )
*   Quantity: 4 units
*   Unit of Issue: EA
*   Destination: 25 CFSD Montreal
*   Delivery Date: On or before December 2023

### Additional Requirements

*   Bidders who propose an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number, and NCAGE they are offering.
*   Suppliers must submit documents in one of the two official languages of Canada.

### Procurement Method

*   The procurement method is competitive and open bidding.
*   The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

*   Name: Audrée Poissant-Viau
*   Email: [audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca](mailto:audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 00
*   Fax: None
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2

Note: The contact information for the vendor is the same for both the English and French versions. The PDF files for the tender can be accessed on the Government of Canada website. 

As with many government tenders
